column4: i need help guys, the gnome is slow on my machine.. how can i install xfce ??
i need help guys, the gnome is slow on my machine.. how can i install xfce ??
apt-get install xfce4 <---im a noob, should i type anything b4 this, will i have the option to run gnome or xfce during boot???
type sudo before it.  You may want to install xubuntu-desktop instead
